subject: Tech Daily: AI Revolution is Here
body: Hi there! In today's edition, we explore how AI is changing the landscape of productivity. Don't miss our webinar on Friday at 3 PM EST.

subject: URGENT: Q4 Report Needed
body: Hi, I need the Q4 financial report on my desk by tomorrow morning. Please prioritize this. Also, can you schedule a team sync for Monday?

subject: Dinner this weekend?
body: Hey! Are you free for dinner this Saturday? Let me know.

subject: Your Invoice #12345
body: Thank you for your business. Attached is your invoice for October. Amount due: $49.99.

subject: New Job Opportunity: Senior Developer
body: Hi, I came across your profile and was impressed by your experience. We have an opening for a Senior Developer role. Are you open to a chat?

subject: Project Alpha: Kickoff Meeting
body: Team, let's schedule the kickoff meeting for Project Alpha. Please share your availability for next Tuesday. We need to finalize the roadmap.

subject: CONGRATULATIONS! You won a gift card!
body: Click here to claim your $1000 gift card now! Limited time offer.

subject: Open Enrollment for Benefits
body: This is a reminder that open enrollment for health benefits ends this Friday. Please log in to the portal to make your selections.

subject: Feedback on Design Mockups
body: We've reviewed the latest designs. Overall they look good, but we have a few changes. Can you update the logo size and change the primary color to blue? Let's review on Wednesday.

subject: Security Alert: Suspicious Login
body: We detected a login attempt from a new device. If this wasn't you, please change your password immediately.

subject: 5 Tips to Boost Your SEO
body: In this week's newsletter, we share 5 actionable tips to improve your website's ranking. Read more on our blog.

subject: Lunch today?
body: Heading out for tacos at 12:30. Want to join?

subject: [JIRA] Issue #456 Updated
body: User 'jdoe' updated issue #456: 'Fix login bug'. Status changed to 'In Progress'.

subject: All Hands Meeting
body: Please join us for the quarterly All Hands meeting this Thursday at 4 PM. Attendance is mandatory.

subject: Your package has shipped
body: Your order #998877 has shipped and will arrive tomorrow. Track your package here.

subject: Server Maintenance Scheduled
body: We will be performing routine maintenance on the production servers this Sunday from 2 AM to 4 AM. Expect downtime.

subject: Reminder: Python User Group Tonight
body: Don't forget the Python User Group meetup is happening tonight at 7 PM. See you there!

subject: Electricity Bill Due
body: Your electricity bill for October is ready. Total amount: $85.50. Due date: Nov 15th.

subject: Photos from the trip
body: Here are the photos from our hiking trip. It was so much fun! Let's do it again soon.

subject: Investment Opportunity of a Lifetime
body: Dear Sir/Madam, I have a business proposal that will yield 500% returns in one month. Reply for details.
